body_html:
Hello @ymakkapa ,
As suggested by your console, did you try executing Sudo with -H option?
I had a similar issue and I used virtual environment because I did not have root access. Please try these options and let me know what happened.

body:
Hello @ymakkapa ,
As suggested by your console, did you try executing Sudo with -H option?
 I had a similar issue and I used virtual environment because I did not have root access. Please try these options and let me know what happened.
